name: Powerful Shape
text: Your wild shapes are mighty and muscular.
prerequisites: Wild shape class feature, druid level 8th.
benefit: When in wild shape, treat your size as one category larger for the purpose of calculating CMB, CMD, carrying capacity, and any size-based special attacks you use or that are used against you (such as grab, swallow whole, and trample).
mythicText: The forms you take in wild shape tower over their natural counterparts.
mythicBenefit:
You can apply the giant simple template (quick rules version, from Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 295) to any form you take with wild shape. This replaces the benefit from Powerful Shape.

As a free action, you can expend one use of mythic power to combine the benefit from this feat with the benefit from non-mythic Powerful Shape for a number of rounds equal to your tier.
text_zh: 你的自然变身是如此的威武霸气！
prerequisites_zh: 【自然变身】职业特性，德鲁伊8级。
benefit_zh: 自然变身状态中，在计算CMB、CMD、承载能力、或者任何与体型相关的特殊攻击（如攫抓、吞咽、践踏）时，将你的体型视为大一级。
mythicText_zh: 你在自然变身中化身的形态远超自然界中的同类。
mythicBenefit_zh:
你能够将巨化生物模板（快速套用规则版，请见怪物图鉴的295页）套用到任何自然变身变化的形态上。这会取代壮硕形体专长的好处。

以自由动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，以此将该专长与非神话版的壮硕形体专长的好处结合起来，持续轮数等同于你的阶层。
